title: Anyone get stuck in loading screen?
body: After the recent patch I get stuck in the champ loading screen. I get a black screen everytime. Any advice?

replies.body: Getting stuck in the loading screen after champion select may be due to your network blocking communication to the game server, so you'll end up looking at a black screen.  I suggest giving our [Connection Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get this fixed up for you.
can anyone help me with my screen it has to go to 100% TO LAUNCH BUT IT TAKES LIKE 5HOURS JUST TO GO TO 1% ANYONE  KNOWS WHY PLS TELL ME

> [{quoted}](name=popularMMO1,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=WIs4uQG4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-15T15:17:11.790+0000)
>
> can anyone help me with my screen it has to go to 100% TO LAUNCH BUT IT TAKES LIKE 5HOURS JUST TO GO TO 1% ANYONE  KNOWS WHY PLS TELL ME

popularMMO1, I'm not sure if you are referring to the patcher or the game loading screen.  Can you provide some more information and details with the issue you're experiencing, including what percent you are getting stuck at?    The patcher can take a few moments to download updates depending on your computer, and it's important to allow it to finish processing.  Let me know and I'd be happy to help!
